entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gaspésie (Parc national)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-Chat 09:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -16.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -20.7°C
Wind: SSW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
